CustomField.description: Upsertable if the type of address is Billing Address
CustomField.formula: IF( INClUDES(Type__c,"Billing Address"),TRUE, FALSE) && OR(Account__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'FI_Account',Account__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SE_Account') && Account__r.ON_Upsertable__c && NOT(ISNULL(Account__r.ON_LastUpsert__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Upsertable if the type of address is Billing Address
CustomField.label: Connector: Upsertable
